scripts.test-coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --recursive --compilers js:babel-register --require babel-polyfill -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.watch: ./node_modules/.bin/parallelshell './node_modules/.bin/watchify -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/server/public/abecms/scripts/template-engine.js -o src/server/public/abecms/scripts/template-engine-compiled.js' './node_modules/.bin/watchify -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/server/public/abecms/scripts/admin.js -o src/server/public/abecms/scripts/admin-compiled.js' './node_modules/.bin/watchify -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/server/public/abecms/scripts/user-login.js -o src/server/public/abecms/scripts/user-login-compiled.js' 'npm run watch:sass'
scripts.mvasset: mkdirp dist/server/public/abecms && cp -r src/server/locale dist/server && cp -r src/server/views dist/server && cp -r src/server/public/abecms/css dist/server/public/abecms && cp -r src/server/public/abecms/fonts dist/server/public/abecms && cp -r src/server/public/abecms/image dist/server/public/abecms
scripts.build:front: npm run js:admin && npm run js:users && npm run js:engine && npm run sass
scripts.build:scripts: npm run build:front && ./node_modules/.bin/babel --presets es2015,stage-0 -d dist/server src/server/ && ./node_modules/.bin/babel --presets es2015,stage-0 -d dist/cli src/cli/ && npm run mvasset
scripts.compile: ./node_modules/.bin/babel --presets es2015,stage-0 -d dist/ src/ && cp -r src/cli/core/config/config.json dist/cli/core/config/config.json
scripts.distribute: npm run build:front && npm run compile && npm run mvasset
scripts.watchdev: npm run build:front && npm run compile && npm run mvasset && nodemon --debug --exec npm run compile && npm run mvasset --kill-others
scripts.startdev: npm run build:front && npm run compile && npm run mvasset && node src/tasks/nodemon.js & npm run watch --kill-others
scripts.startdevOnly: npm run js:admin && npm run js:users && npm run js:engine && node src/tasks/nodemon.js & npm run watch --kill-others
